Our Maisons are stepping into the holiday season, and we love it!
_
From iconic to essential, glamorous to must-have, find your favourite Guerlain products for a season of joy and exceptional moments. 
May your holidays be full of beauty with our Maison @guerlain! 
#LVMH #guerlain #guerlaingift #holidayseason

Our Maisons are stepping into the holiday season, and we love it!

Make the world a better place and wear your vegan Stella Stans!

#LVMH #StellaMcCartney #StellaHoliday #StanSmith

This year, spread holiday cheer with the gift of fresh. 
Fresh unveiled its holiday set: cleansers, face creams, toners, masksâ€¦ It has everything you need to take care of your skin for Christmas and New Yearâ€™s Eve. 
At a family dinner or on the dance floor, Fresh products will make your skin glow like never before. So don't be scared of grey winter days, and go Fresh for the holidays!

#LVMH #Fresh #GiveFresh

What scent are you waiting for?

Our Maisons shine by their honorable values and ecological commitments. 
_
Kenzo Parfums unveiled its new collaboration with visual artist William Amor: The Messenger Poppy. 
Symbol of a fragile yet strong beauty, the poppy lives, vibrates and pulsates with the spirit of the times. 
_
Kenzo Parfums opened up its heritage and plunged it into the creativity of Â« material ennobler Â» William Amor, reinventing the iconic flower of the Maison, endowing it a new role: messenger of hope. William Amor, formerly in residence at the Ateliers de Paris, is known for spreading powerful messages upcycling and transforming abandoned and waste materials into artistic objects. For Kenzo Parfums, the artist created a field of 250 flowers from unused materials; a splendid and ephemeral creation exhibited at a FLOWER BY KENZO in-house event. 
_
This sustainable artistic initiative is an object of art but also a goodwill Christmas gift that will blossom our world into a more beautiful one. Indeed, for each poppy sold, more than half the price is donated to the ORANGE BLOSSOM, FOR A MORE BEAUTIFUL WORLD Program; a program that fights for a more responsible sourcing of Orange Blossom and women empowerment in Morocco.

#LVMH #KenzoParfums #WilliamAmor #FlowerByKenzo

During the evening, moderated by Radio Classique commentator David Abiker, three initiatives by LVMH Maisons were singled out from among the many actions by the Groupâ€™s 75 Maisons: 
Louis Vuittonâ€™s partnership with UNICEF, an initiative to support employment for people with disabilities by LVMH Maisons in Italy, and the Sephora Stands program in the United States.

The LVMH DÃ®ner des Maisons EngagÃ©es was a moment of sharing in a fun, convivial ambiance as well, with performances by the singing duo Brigitte, as well as the Sankofa Unit Urban Choir, invited to lead the tables in singing in harmony. 
The upbeat entertainment proved a perfect way to cap a year of active social solidarity across the LVMH Group.

#LVMH #CSR #RSE @davidabiker @secourspop @associationkelina @floracoquerel @louisvuitton @sephora @bulgariofficial @brigittedefrance

Hosted by Chantal Gaemperle, Group Executive Vice President, Human Resources and Synergies and Toni Belloni, LVMH Group Managing Director, the event brought together some thirty LVMH Maisons, joined by prominent personalities and representatives of non-profit organizations to raise funds for a cause supported by LVMH since 2011, the fight against sickle cell anemia.

For this edition, LVMH also wanted to celebrate the work of French charity Secours Populaire to aid vulnerable women, designated as our special cause this year with the operation â€œUne JournÃ©e Pour Soiâ€ â€“ A Day All Your Own.

#LVMH #RSE #CSR

Take a look back at the 7th edition of the LVMHâ€™s â€œDÃ®ner des Maisons engagÃ©esâ€ - Committed Companies Dinner - which capped a year of active support for social solidarity yesterday in Paris. 
This seventh edition of the dinner raised 300,000 euros as LVMH accelerated its support for Robert-DebrÃ© Hospital. Since the beginning of the partnership the Group has donated over a million euros to the hospital. 
In addition, 50,000 euros was raised this year to support the special cause, the Secours Populaire program to help women in vulnerable situations.

#LVMH #CSR #RSE

For the 5th chapter in its artist in residence program sponsored by LVMH MÃ©tiers dâ€™Art, the LVMH Group has selected French artist RaphaÃ«l Barontini. 
Beginning in January 2020, RaphaÃ«l Barontini will spend six months working with artisans at the Heng Long Leather Tannery in Singapore, an internationally-renowned specialist in crocodilian leathers. 
Thirty-five-year-old RaphaÃ«l Barontini â€“ currently presenting his first museum solo exhibition in the U.S. at the SCAD Museum of Art in Savannah until January 2020 â€“ will enjoy access to the production resources of the tannery and will work closely with its artisans.

#LVMH #LVMHMetiersdArt #RaphaelBarontini ðŸ“·Jalil Ourguedi

The LVMH MÃ©tiers dâ€™Art artist in residence program is designed to draw on the materials and savoir-faire of producers recognized for their unique quality as the inspiration for a major artistic project. 
At the same time, the program stimulates the creativity and innovation of the artisans as they engage with the artistâ€™s vision.

To celebrate the end of the residency of Sabrina Vitali, who spent the first part of 2019 at metal hardware manufacture Renato Menegatti, the works she created will be shown in Paris from January 30 to February 22, 2020 in partnership with the Galerie Papillon in the Marais.

Stay tuned.

#SabrinaVitali #LVMH #LVMHMetiersdArt ðŸ“· Portrait: @Giacomo_Cosua ðŸ“· Works: @lannes.thomas

Art and Design are a key source of inspiration for our Maisons to unveil splendid creations.

For Design Miami, Fendi and Maison Francis Kurkdjian presented a three-dimensional distinctive creation where touch, smell and sight took center stage: FENDIFRENESIA. 
In this project, Francis Kurkdjian created for the Roman Maison a gender fluid eau de parfum whose leathery and musky notes reflect the nobility and fluidity of the Selleria leather.

Thanks to the patented technique that the perfumer owns since 2014, Francis Kurkdjian combined its eau de parfum to the iconic FENDI Baguette created by Silvia Venturini Fendi in 1997, reviving again the tradition of scenting the leather.

Feeling and visualizing a fragrance is an evocative, inimitable and evanescent experienceâ€“ a FENDI synaesthesia.

Christelle BoulÃ©, Canadian-Swiss artist and photographer, was appointed to capture the Soul of this new Fendi x Maison Francis Kurkdjian creation.

#LVMH #FendiBaguette #maisonfranciskurkdjian #FendiXDesignMiami

Art and Design are a key source of inspiration for our Maisons to unveil splendid creations.

For Art Basel Miami, Ruinart presents a collaboration with artist Vik Muniz who created a series of 6 photographic works inspired by winegrowers and vineyards facing challenging natural conditions each season. 
Through the use of organic elements such as pieces of blackened wood, charcoal or chardonnay leaves, Vik Munizâ€™ photographs highlight our perception of scale and play with our senses. 
He captured the deep relationships between humans and nature, winegrowers and vines, Ruinart and the Champagne terroir; emphasizing the creative tension that transforms adversity into wonder. 
Artist Vik Muniz and Ruinart chose to associate with Imazon, a NGO dedicated to preserving the Amazon rainforest. The benefits of the sale of 30 copies of the emblematic Chardonnay leaf artwork created and signed by Vik Muniz went directly to Imazon to support the protection of the Amazon Rainforest.

#LVMH #Ruinart #Artbaselmiami

Art and Design have always been a key source within the inspirational material that helps our Maisons unveil splendid creations.

For Art Basel Miami, Berlutiâ€™s creative director Kris Van Assche and FranÃ§ois Laffanour of Galerie Downtown presented a small series of original Pierre Jeanneret pieces, created by the Swiss Architect in the 1950s in order to furnish Chandigarhâ€™s Capitol Complex, in India. 
This furniture, restored by FranÃ§ois Laffanour, has been covered with the emblematic Venezia leather of the Maison Berluti.

The Berluti X Laffanour Galerie Downtown series consists of 17 original and highly collectable pieces. For these unique creations, Kris Van Assche has developed an entirely new palette of colour partly based on the two colours created by Le Corbusier in 1931 and 1959 combined with the rich colours he found in the light, architecture, landscape and foliage on a recent trip to Chandigarh.

#Berluti #KrisVanAssche #DesignMiami #ArtBasel

Art and Design are a key source of inspiration for our Maisons to unveil splendid creations.

For almost a century FENDI has been committed to redefining luxury through the development of new materials and techniques. 
For Design Miami, FENDI presents a new immersive installation created by the Zurich-based design studio Kueng Caputo, known for their unconventional use of materials and playful aesthetic. 
This installation is made of new design pieces intended to decorate the exterior colonnade of the Maisonâ€™s iconic headquarters, the Palazzo della CiviltÃ  Italiana, on the Roman outskirts. 
The resulting collection, entitled â€˜Roman Moldsâ€™, captures the tension that has historically informed much of the Maisonâ€™s best outputâ€“ traditional craft disrupted by innovation.

#LVMH #Fendi #KuengCaputo #FendixDesignMiami @silviaventurinifendi

Art has always been a key source within the inspirational material that helps our Maisons unveil splendid creations.
_
For Design Miami/, Louis Vuitton presents the â€˜Swell Wave Shelfâ€™ by Andrew Kudless, the designerâ€™s first creation for the Louis Vuitton Objets Nomade collection. Louis Vuitton Objets Nomades is an ever-expanding collection of limited-edition, collectable furniture inspired by the Houseâ€™s travel DNA and reinterpretations of its essential spirit. The collection weaves together Louis Vuittonâ€™s savoir-faire and the skills of world-renowned designers to create inventive shapes, materials and products. 
_
The Louis Vuitton Objets Nomades collection includes pieces imagined by some of the most creative designers of our times, including Patricia Urquiola, India Mahdavi, Atelier OÃ¯, Atelier Biagetti, Barber&Osgerby, the Campana Brothers, Damien Langlois-Meurinne, Raw Edges, Zanellato/Bortotto, Marcel Wanders, Tokujin Yoshioka, Nendo, AndrÃ© Fu, and now Andrew Kudless.
_
The Maisonâ€™s collection will be on show at Design Miami/ from December 4th to 8th, 2019. 
#LVMH #LouisVuitton #LVObjetsNomades

Art has always been a key source within the inspirational material that helps our Maisons unveil splendid creations.
_
For Art Basel Miami Beach 2019, the @LOEWEfoundation presents the fifth exhibition in its Chance Encounters series curated by @Jonathan.Anderson; a concept that brings together artists from various disciplines in unexpected conversations.
_
This year British artist Hilary Lloyd creates a major site-specific textile, sound and video installation that engages with the 18th-century Portuguese granary permanently installed at LOEWE Miami Design District space. Large-scale ceramic sculptures by Ewen Henderson (1934 - 2000) â€“ one of Britainâ€™s most esteemed artists working with clay â€“ also occupy the space.
_
Chance Encounters V runs 4 December â€“ 2 February. LOEWE Miami Design District, 110 NE 39th Street, Suite #102. 
#LVMH #LOEWE #LOEWEfoundation

The Group and its Maisons unveil the beauty of heritage by renewing it. 
In the heart of Portofino harbour, among a colourful blend of Italian houses, the Maison Belmond is currently renovating one of its most authentic hotel: â€˜Splendido Mareâ€™. In days gone by, Belmond Splendido Mare was the first hotel in Portofino to offer refuge to fishermen escaping the storms. Thanks to History, the hotel is now pervaded by a delightful abyssal breeze that reminds us the good old days of the men and the sea. 
_
The idea behind renovating the hotel and its 14 guest rooms is to celebrate this Portofino heritage that framed the charm of the Maisonâ€™s former haven, highlighting the Italian fondness for sophistication and refinement. For this occasion, Belmond combines its excellence to the savoir-faire of Paris based designers FESTEN architecture. Together, they will create a new design drawing inspiration from Italian nautical traditions, plunging Splendido Mareâ€™s guests into a typical Portofino fishing boat architecture. 
The re-opening is set for June 2020. 
_
ðŸ“· @stuartcantorphotography
_
#LVMH #Belmond #TheArtOfBelmond

The applications for the 7th edition of the LVMH Prize for Young Fashion Designers are now open! 
Over the 25 years since the foundation of LVMH, the Maisons in the Group have all been inspired  by a passion for creativity and innovation while nourishing an exceptional heritage rooted in timehonored know-how.

Motivated by this â€œpassion for creativityâ€, LVMH continually supports the world of fashion globally through corporate philanthropic initiatives, including with the LVMH Prize for Young Fashion Designers. This initiative helps drive the momentum and emergence of fresh talent that is essential to the vitality and diversity of the fashion ecosystem, a role that is perfectly in phase with the responsibilities of the world leader in luxury.

Applications must be submitted exclusively on the Prize website www.lvmhprize.com until February 2nd, 2020. 
Good luck!

#LVMHPrize #LVMH
